title: Man On Wire
description:
Tig and Cheryl walk us through "Man On Wire", the Oscar-winning (news to Tig and Cheryl!) doc about a French tightrope walker who pulled off a historic stunt between the Twin Towers in NYC. Plus, the episode takes a real turn at one point-- but it makes for a really special episode of True Story. *this episode spills beans* Get merch at podswag.com/truestory (tigandcheryltruestory@gmail.com)

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
